thread.title: Airwheel M3 Electric Skateboard for Teenagers leads the skateboard to be more and more intelligent
thread.title_full: Airwheel M3 Electric Skateboard for Teenagers leads the skateboard to be more and more intelligent

title: Airwheel M3 Electric Skateboard for Teenagers leads the skateboard to be more and more intelligent
text: Airwheel M3 Electric Skateboard for Teenagers leads the skateboard to be more and more intelligent With faster and faster speed living space, there is no time for people to control an intricate product which has raised a higher requirement for the manufacture factory. Airwheel Technology Holding lives up to expectations by introducing new products. The wireless remote control skateboard M3 is one of them. Being intelligent and eye-catching, Airwheel M3 will become your new sweetheart. USA, 21 October 2015 -- Everything, related with intelligence will become hot issues in the modern society, Roomba, Intelligent house keeper and robots are no exception. To be simpler and easier is the ultimate quest for people. Compared with the last decade, the life in today is beyond peopleâ€™s imagination. With high speed living space, there is no time for people to control an intricate product which has raised a higher requirement for the manufacture factory. Airwheel Technology Holding lives up to expectations by introducing new products. The wireless remote control skateboard M3 is one of them.Airwheel M3 electric skateboard is made of Canadian maple, with stable performance and non-deformation, so that it is also called electric skateboard . Different from the traditional skateboard, Airwheel M3 is equipped with remote control with infinitely variable speeds. With the 2.4 G wireless remote control, it can realize infinitely variable speeds and the effective distance reaches 10 meters. The design of double circuits and double main control chips ensure M3 electric skateboard a conqueror. The control chip, installed in the internal part of motorized skateboard M3, will collect data throughout the vehicle, and transmitto the phone wirelessly. The visualization data through instant analysis computation, can be feed backed to the user by mobile phone APP which can be downloaded from the official website in real-time. The cell protection board can provide a consummate protection system, including overcurrent, over discharge, over-charge, short circuit, temperature, battery equalization. To ride unimpededly, to enjoy the perfect experience. Airwheel M3 complete skateboard can make you lead a more brilliant life. When you set feet on it, you cannot resist the zeal to play it. For youth, if play, then play differently. Being intelligent and eye-catching, Airwheel M3 will become your new sweetheart and offer a fresh sight of world.
